ComicInfo.Summary: Lady Deathâ€™s journey has been a long and tragic one. In this special Origins series we delve deeply into the fabric of her being and watch as the last chapter of her origin is finally revealed by original series creator Brian Pulido. From innocent to deadly warrior, Lady Death has given up her humanity to save her mother but will find that the evil sorcerer Sagos has taken everything that ever mattered from her. And now he plans to take the Blacklands and her soul as well. Available with a sexy Regular painted cover by Jason Eden, and Wraparound or Sultry covers by Michael Dipascale. Also available with a special Art Deco Retailer Order Incentive by painter Michael Dipascale!
